game.name: White Party Surprise
game.description:
The three most beautiful princesses Ariel, Cinderella and Rapunzel have received the invitation from the princess Elsa for the white party. Many surprises will be there to come out. These three beauties look happy, but are confused what to put on to look fabulous in the party. Your impressive fashion sense has forced them to hire you as their personal stylist. Join White Party Surprise and be prepared to help them to pick up the coolest party looks they have ever carried!
Your objective in this brand new girls game is to guide the girls to wear the gorgeous looks and find out what surprise they have in the party. Start with the Cinderella who looks gorgeous in an off-shoulder white mini dress with long bell sleeves! Give her a lovely chic bob hairstyle and combine her look with a fun unicorn themed clutch, a statement bracelet and a white chocker with a heart in this one of the best HTML5 dressing games for girls!
A glittery collar outfit with a combination of white pants with cool stripes will be perfect for Ariel. Make sure to braid her hair on a side and do not forget to pair it with a cool headband with cat ears and crystals. Dress up Rapunzel with a strapless white top with feathers and pair it with a high-low skirt with lace in this princess game! Give her a straight hair and choose a holographic clutch to make her look beautiful! Get ready to know the surprise the cute Elsa has for the other three princesses then! Have fun daily on atmegame.com without download games!
